item.title: A new chapter of book is out: Body, action, and space representations in people affected by spinal cord injuries.
item.author: Author
item.description:
Dear all, the book “Diagnosis and Tratment of Spinal Cord Injury”, containing in the third chapter a review concerning how these representations change consequently to a spinal cord injury is out!

Scandola, M. (2022). Body, action, and space representations in people affected by spinal cord injuries. In R. Rajendram, V. Preedy, & C. Martin (Eds.), Diagnosis and Treatment of Spinal Cord Injury (1st ed., pp. 27–39). Elsevier. https://doi.org/10.1016/B978-0-12-822498-4.00003-8
